column2: "Dammit, I got overconfident after the Caterdra'nsa thing... Shoulda known I'd hit a wall sooner rather than later."

"Heh, I know that look in your eyes,
<%me>!
I know you'll work out a strat for me!"
"It's true what they say, your comrades are your most valuable assets! I really appreciate this, pal!"
